entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is mentioned as one of the schools that has arrived at Hogwarts, described as a carriage pulled by winged horses.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as one of the schools that has arrived at Hogwarts, described as a carriage pulled by winged horses.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students who witnessed the arrival of Beauxbatons and Durmstrang.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the students who jumped backward onto a Slytherin fifth year's foot when the carriage landed.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as one of the houses at Hogwarts, with a fifth-year student being stepped on by Neville.

relationships.description: Beauxbatons and Durmstrang arrived at Hogwarts together, described as carriages pulled by winged horses.
Harry witnessed the arrival of Beauxbatons, seeing the carriage and its golden horses.
Neville collided with a Slytherin fifth-year student when the carriage landed.
